answers.answer: i looked for your last post hun but sadly couldnt find it , hope all is well with u .... hugss

check out my post on lexepro and talk to your dr, or psyc. about possible adverse to ssri drugs. i tried five different ones and i don't care who says what on here, i have struggled for about a year with anxiety and panic attacks since i tried 1, 10mg. lexepro 1 year ago. before then i never even knew what anxiety and panic attacks were. today it's klonopin and just stopped abilify (mood stabalizer) having bad panic attack pretty much right now. only took abilify 1mg. once daily for four days haven't slept in about 30 hours. waiting on call back from psyc. right now.

I tried but couldnt find your last post. But, I can assure you thst my anxiety is as bad or almost as  bad or worse than yours is. I have this HORRIBLE fear of diabetes and sugar, and am only 13. EVERY SINGLE MOMENT I am thinking bout it and biting my nails and trembling outta fear and anxiety. I went to the doctor and they told me I was physically fine, but said I was getting bad anxiety. When I get anxiety I get dry mouth, I lose my appetite, I tend to lose sense of what goes on around me, I sweat A LOT, and my heart beats like crazy. I have gone to a therapist, and I have gotten better a little, but then I went back to where I started! You are not alone.

question: PLEASE SOMEONE READ MY LAST POST... IM HAVING BAD ANXIETY!
title: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE SOMEONE READ MY LAST POST
